author: Trash Boii
content: Garbage fire service and garbage fire printers. Not only does the app not properly track your ink levels but when you try to print anything at all it forces you to go through a SERVER that then sends it to your printer. If that server is down, good luck printing! The app constantly disconnects from printers and customer support is worthless! I have been fighting my printer for 3 years and today I smashed it on the ground after 5 errors. Do not use HP printers. Get a refund.

I love selling my data, I love making new accounts, I love having to take me half an hour to print.

HP used to have such a good name bud i am very disappointed now

author: Deb Loy
content: No easy way to update your wifi connection if you change providers. This is ridiculous because it's a common occurrence.

author: rose london
content: Sometimes it works well sometimes it doesn't because it needs wifi,a cell phone AND and hp account. I hate that it needs all 3 on order to work properly. I will not buy a product with those requirements again.

author: J M
content: make more paper size option or edit paper size on app.

author: morena madupe (King)
content: it's the best

author: Shrikant Kumar Ravi
content: very good

author: Marvin Marcos
content: Excellent Printer, intuitive and easy to use controls. Best printer for its price.

author: Joey Jermer
content: works good

author: Leila Phelps
content: May or may not work...you never know! sure can't count on anything except being billed for ink and pages not used because it doesn't work 75% of the time! constantly pressing to buy a new printer because they no longer support the one you have! update: nothing but WORSE! I'VE PAID FOR A LOT OF INK THAT I'VE NEVER BEEN ABLE TO GET OR USE BECAUSE NO MATTER HOW MANY TIMES IT SAYS ITS WORKING....IT'S NOT! I'VE PUT MY CODE NUMBERS/ PASS WORDS IN MULTIPLE TIMES...ZILCH! NADA! NOTHING! NO PRINTING!

author: Renee Dillon
content: good

author: Ethan Hart
content: Total trash; wasted loads of time getting my printer set up.

author: Serge Meloche
content: good

author: DTM_Panda
content: This app is a complete waste of time, I brought a HP deskJet 2910 to help me print my policies and contracts for my company and found out that I can't install this app onto my chromebook because it's incompatiable, i need to get a 2nd ethernet cable and hopefully do it that way since my main office computer hasn't got bluetooth installed but to think that for anyone who wanted a printer, this app would be available for all devices right, i tried to use this on mobile but even on mobile i can't.

author: Ashley Lopez
content: this printer is always dropping connection and god himself couldn't connect back to it I hate this printer this app worse possible investment but it definitely makes sure it takes out its monthly subscription payment with no problems

author: Alfredo Maldonado
content: Great printer app and tools

author: SeAnne Woods
content: print takes hours to print remotely

author: G√°bor Vincze
content: Without an online account is it good for nothing. No scan, no copy, even your printing will go through the HP servers.

author: Shaly Shaly
content: Wow Nice experience with this app üòçüëè

author: A Google user
content: good

author: Darlene Harris
content: don't like it. I can't print from my phone now.

author: Amy Gabbert
content: When it prints, it's ok! Usually I have a connectivity issue and nothing prints. It locked me out when I bought generic ink refills. I had a subscription for a time, but did not appreciate being told I was printing too much. Why did own a home printer if it's often useless???

author: Gary Bilton
content: So far, completely useless. after a couple of introductory screens just goes to a blank screen (Samsung phone and Tablet) Recent reviews suggest the app is broken. shame as the printer appeared half decent. Printer returned. I should have checked the app reviews before purchase

author: Angie Cornell
content: super easy once you find the right area to go to (needed to scan to phone)

author: Brendan McCabe
content: I found it difficult to setup. Once successfully installed it is excellent. January 2026, after changing the modem and new password, the printer and the app don't recognise each other. I am at this now for 4 hours and have decided to delete the app. ü§î

author: Luisa Galindo
content: BAD APP, it won't even open and I've uninstalled it 3 times already. NOTHING. I AM NOT HAPPY WITH HPs printers anymore, they used to be so much better ten years ago. They are getting worse to setup and connect and keep connected & reconnect to the internet. And the ink runs out too fast, then it starts streaking and stops printing even though the you've replaced the darn ink. But yes, this new app won't even open, at least the hp smart app would open up, geez! And this is happening when I need!

author: Dub Williams
content: Not sure what's going on but I'm trying to open the app and all I'm getting is a blank white screen...and yes, I've closed tasks/apps, reset phone and checked for updates. Please help!

author: Preeti Kasturia
content: does not work even after uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times.

author: Dawid Opalka
content: great help with the office

author: Andrew Sargent
content: won't open

content: Updated app now it won't even work, literally just a blank white screen. Absolutely terrible

author: Jennifer Foster
content: Downloaded the app. App wouldn't load. Reinstalled it. Still didn't work. Finally uninstalled the useless app

content: 404 error on some printer's manual pages

author: Candy tulipano
content: terrible will not let me fax this thing has a mind of its own I don't think I will be buying another hp

author: kishore kumar
content: completely irritating application. never expected this kind of service from hp. It literally always shows something went wrong, this error is so common that the customer support made a video on this mentioned same error. but still the error continues, better the tech support works on this in solving this error, app is dependent on browser, it would be good if it is made a complete application instead of depending on the browser

author: Hafiz BahaUdDin Ch
content: worst app, compex system to connect. asking to turn on location which is already on. so you can not use your printer due to their error and shity app. just making things complex. i am gonna sale my new printer just because of their system and poor connectivity

author: Teneille De Jong
content: Pretty easy setup, however a bit frustrating to use. Attempting to scan JP certified ID and the system keeps automatically cropping out the JP's stamp and signature. If you forget to select the whole page before continuing, there is no way to undo it and I am forced to start over. I also can't figure out how to send multiple pages as one file but perhaps it is user error and I need to actually read the manual...

author: NoID NoID
content: good, just good

author: Dave Brookes
content: great thanks

author: raymund patricio
content: great! love it.

author: Burak Taban
content: you have to sign up to scan documents lol

author: Brooke Faris
content: Printers have a monthly charge and they come with no paper but yet you need paper to set up the printer so now it's two store trips and another subscription later üò≠

author: mechelle siemer
content: I'm unable to print anytime I need to. everything i go to print something out off my phone the hp printer isn't connected. I've had problems since October
